question.question_subtype: Select One or More Answer Choices
question.stimulus: A sentence about effective writing techniques
question.question_stem: Well-chosen __________ add __________ and credibility to your writing.

explanations.A: Correct! Details provide specific, concrete information that enhances the depth and believability of writing.
explanations.B: Incorrect. Metaphors can add color, but they do not universally add substantive interest.
explanations.C: Incorrect. Paragraphs are structural elements, not sources of interest themselves.
explanations.D: Incorrect. Arguments provide logical reasoning but do not inherently create interest.

explanations.E: Correct! Interest captures the reader's attention and makes the writing engaging.
explanations.F: Incorrect. Complexity does not necessarily make writing more compelling.
explanations.G: Incorrect. Length alone does not improve the quality of writing.
explanations.H: Incorrect. Formality does not directly contribute to the writing's appeal.

question_details.learning_outcome: Students will critically evaluate the elements that enhance writing quality and engagement.
question_details.learning_objective: Assess the ability to identify and understand the role of specific writing components in creating effective, compelling prose.
